Call
Visit
National Care Hotline \nTel: 1800-202-6868
Worried, stressed or anxious during COVID-19? Speak to our counsellors today for support. \n
IMH Mental Health Hotline \nTel: 6389 2222
If you are facing a mental health crisis, please call our Helpline or seek medical help at our 24-hour Emergency Services located in our hospital. \n
Samaritans of Singapore \nTel: 1800-221-4444
We provide round the clock emotional support for those in distress \n
Silver Ribbon Singapore \nTel: 6385 3714
Launched by Former President S R Nathan on 4 Feb 2006 to combat mental health stigma and encourage early treatment \n
TouchLine(Counseling) \nTel: 1800-377-2252
Our team of qualified counselors and youth workers will be able to provide face to face counselling, group mentoring, peer and community support and family therapy sessions \n
Li Meng \nTel: 9827-6591
Talk to me if you need a listening ear! \n

Ever felt afraid and alone? Some of our resources here may be able to help.
Simple exercises to bring a peace of mind, making way for better sleep each night.
You matter to us and we will do our best to support you. Some of these practices here might offer some solace in these trying times.
There are times when anxiety gets the better of us. Some of our practices here may help in easing anxious nerves.
Practices that give a quick run through on the what and how-to in easing panic
Obsessive thoughts and compulsive behaviors can become so consuming they interfere with your daily life. Our practices may help give a better understanding and how to cope with OCD.
